ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo

Class WorldGroundImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo.WorldObjectImpl
      • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo.WorldLayerImpl
        • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo.WorldGroundImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable, NamedObject, WorldLayer, WorldObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElasticGround

    public class WorldGroundImpl
extends WorldLayerImpl
implements WorldLayer
    Layer within a world which is zoomable and pannable. It contains world objects.
